mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.order_name as orderName ,a.caozuo_name as caozuoName ,a.caozuo_table as caozuoTable ,a.order_types as orderTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM in_out_order a
and a.order_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.orderName},'%')
and a.caozuo_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.caozuoName},'%')
and a.caozuo_table like CONCAT('%',#{params.caozuoTable},'%')
and a.order_types = #{params.orderTypes}
and DATE_FORMAT(a.insert_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.insertTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')
and DATE_FORMAT(a.insert_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.insertTimeEnd} , '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
